Description:
"PERROWOOD" - 44.58 Ha - 110 Ac (approx.)
This truly magnificent small acreage holding is perfectly suited to the devoted 'horse lover'. The property is superbly equipped for the horse trainer and/or equestrian interests.
'Perrowood' is located on the cusp of the Drysdale township in a highly appreciating area that offers unlimited potential.
The land is also ideal for cattle and sheep, cropping and other farming pursuits. Comprising numerous stables and yards, round yard, tack rooms, site hut, several horse shelters, a magnificent 1,600 metre training track, several water tanks and 3 main dams.
Situated within 20 minutes of Geelong's CBD, 60 minutes to Melbourne and on the edge of the Drysdale township. Also it is in within easy reach of surf and recreational beaches, several golf courses and wineries, excellent primary and secondary schools and quality shopping facilities.
A wonderful lifestyle property awaits for you to create your dream home (STCA).
Insights: 651-689 Grubb Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Comfortable family living in a quiet court location
In a quiet cul-de-sac of Drysdale, you can enjoy a slice of semi-rural life in this delightfully presented home and fine established garden. An elevated path leads past the double garage to the verandah and front door - with raised garden beds in full bloom. A study/front bedroom leads off the long central hall, and adjacent is the master bedroom with a ceiling fan, walk-in wardrobe and ensuite. On the other side of the hallway a large opening reveals a formal sitting room with glimpses of the back garden. However the substantial terraced garden is fully revealed once you reach the open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room. Sliding doors open onto a covered timber deck where you’re surrounded by a smorgasbord of flora, including roses, daisies, lavender, geraniums and fruit trees - the perfect spot for a long relaxed lunch or dinner. The kitchen has a curved servery bench with a double sink.
An appealing dining alcove has windows on three sides, providing another perspective on the garden. There’s lots of lounge space for kicking back and enjoying a good movie or your favourite TV show. There’s a laundry with storage cupboards, a third and possible fourth bedroom (currently an artist’s studio) and second bathroom with separate WC. At the rear of the property there’s an open-fronted shed which acts as a plant nursery, and also incorporates a fishpond and storage. The house has ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans, and a split system, so year-round comfort is a certainty. The Drysdale shopping centre is just a few minutes drive away - plus schools, sporting facilities and the lake. Land size 711sqm approx

Description:
A GRACIOUS HOME WITH PRIME VILLAGE POSITION, SOLAR PLUS 2ND ACCESS.
Wide entrance with light filled formal lounge at the front, second open plan living combining dining, well designed kitchen with doors opening to undercover entertaining area... functions as a third living space. Four bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, three other bedrooms have BIR's, all rooms are generous proportions. Features include; fans, evaporative cooling, gas wall heater, gas log burner, double pantry, dishwasher, good storage, quality drapes and fittings. Double garage with second access to second garage. A real haven allowing for privacy while still living with all at your doorstep. This cannot be missed if you want to live a great lifestyle on the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Market Entry, Position Perfect
Sought after central Drysdale township position. This generous 764m2 approx. allotment is within walking distance to shopping, cafes, professional offices, schools and parkland. The home is an oldie but a goodie built of solid Besser brick construction with four bedrooms all with BIRs and two bathrooms. The living area is spacious with solid fuel heating, R/C air conditioner and northerley access to an undercover outdoor entertaining area. The galley kitchen has been renovated.
Outside the established garden has a lovely array of trees and garden beds including three garden sheds. A great opportunity for the home renovator or first home buyer to enter the market.
Appointment a must.

Big Land Perfect Position
Perfect for the astute first home buyer seeking maximum convenience with a multitude of options for the future or savvy investor seeking growth and the potential to unlock massive value. Positioned on approx. 825sqm of land allowing to extend or subdivide (STCA). A solid home consisting of three bedrooms, light filled lounge plus separate kitchen and meals area. Well located within easy distance to Drysdale Village, Drysdale Primary, Christian College Bellarine, Geelong CBD in 15 minutes and all that the Bellarine has to offer including wineries, quality beaches and entertainment options. An often sought combination of big land with big conveniencebook your inspection today!

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - A Touch of Tuscany on the Bellarine
Perched high on a large block (approx. 2707m2) overlooking a picturesque tree-lined street, sits this stately 4-bedroom rendered brick residence. A notable curved driveway with a beautifully cultivated 'flower & gum' irrigated garden makes an impressive arrival. The striking Tuscan arches and sculpture set the scene for the entrance hall with ceilings reaching to 12ft. An extensive floor plan offers luxury living, with exceptional quality fittings and fixtures.
The jewel of this amazing home is the north facing central dual-zoned living areas with Corio Bay views. The kitchen/lounge/dining area is defined with commanding designed bulkheads and a curved partition wall allowing filtered natural light, all showcased in an open plan setting. Then impressively complimented with an indoor-outdoor entertaining mecca with: a Gaggenau cooking hub (deep fryer & electric BBQ) and rangehood; living and dining area; powder room with shower, the magnificent spotted gum deck and handrailing with s/steel balustrade, and a 5-person spa. These two spaces together are truly amazing and your friends and family will be booking their parties with you!
The impressive main kitchen offers black granite benches, plumbed refrigeration facilities, double-sunken sink, classic timber cabinetry, Bosch dishwasher, Westinghouse built-in oven & 5-gas burner stainless steel cooktop with tile and glass bricks splashback, microwave nook, and a walk-in pantry. The western wing functions superbly for everyday living. Accommodating the spacious laundry (exterior access), main bathroom, separate WC, guest bedroom, hall built-in cupboards and access to the double garage.
The palatial master suite offers a luxurious haven with a double-door entrance, WIR, floor-raised large spa, double vanity, ceiling fan, separate WC, shower with Dorf gold plated tapware, plated rainfall head, taps and towel rack. A pleasant outlook with French doors overlooking the indoor-outdoor hub with frosted glass and cafe 'block out' blinds for optimum privacy. The billiard room centrally located and with triple doorway access, is an opulent addition to the entertaining features of the home. This marvellous home offers expansive and enviable living for a growing family and well into the teen years. Perfectly located and within excellent proximity to Drysdale's everyday amenities, and the 'playground' of the Bellarine Peninsula. Only 5 minutes to the main boat ramp.
- 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, 4 WC, 7 car parking
- Bedrooms all with built-in robes, and hall built-in storage
- Colorbond Boathouse (land set) with 3.6m entrance, and dedicated rear sealed driveway
- Double garage, terraced backyard with 50m retaining wall
- Enormous shed/workshop/double garage fitted with workbenches and toolboards
- Studio/office/teenage retreat with separate WC and own TV aerial.
- Ducted heating throughout, s/system in main open plan living area, block out blinds
Insights: 17 Marsh Court, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
WALK TO DRYSDALE VILLAGE, BIG FAMILY HOME ON 720 SQM
No. 9 Leonard presents multiple relaxed family spaces over 3 living areas, with a solar passive inclination framed with extensively landscaped gardens. A stunning northerly aspect fills the rear informal living space with light; while the adjoining living/dining/kitchen areas flow out to a beautiful entertaining patio and barbeque area. The spacious front sitting room is ideal for formal entertaining or provides flexability for your requirements, complementing generous 4 bedroom accommodation, home office, 2 bathrooms and double garage with access to rear yard. Extras include quality wool carpets, ducted heating, refrigerated air-conditioning, ducted vacuum, fans, pantry , dishwasher,pantry,walk in linen cupboard and more. The chance to buy well in this tightly held pocket....a gem!

Description:
When Location Counts
* PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION
When location counts it really doesnt get any better than this! You are a stones throw away from the Drysdale Township, local schools, transport and within proximity to the Queenscliff/Portarlington Ferries and the many amazing wineries across the Bellarine.
This neat package comprises four bedrooms, the master with walk-in robe and generous full ensuite. The main bathroom and separate toilet are central to the remaining three bedrooms which are equipped with build-in robes. The hub of the home is the open plan kitchen/dining and lounge room drenched in north facing sunlight. The outside area is extremely practical for entertaining, kids and pets with a lovely large deck area, built-in BBQ and pizza oven, garden shed and access into the garage.
Features of the home include; heating and cooling, alarm system, storage in the laundry plus linen press, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and double lock up garage with remote entry.
This home would be a fantastic addition to the portfolio, first home buyer or the ideal downsize option.

Description:
Top Shelf!
It is very fitting that this fine property is positioned in one of Central Walk's most elevated pockets as it truly is 'top shelf' in every sense!
Showcasing a stunning light and bright 'feel' this quality build will feel like home from the moment you turn the key.
The main living area boasts a lovely northerly orientation and ensures it is bathed in natural light all year round. Big expansive windows frame fully landscaped gardens; feature fire pit area and the beautifully mature gum trees just over your back fence on the neighbouring acreage. An adjoining tiled alfresco offers a lovely area for an early morning coffee or a late wine.
The kitchen 'serves up' a practical user friendly design (complete with expansive walk in pantry) and boasts some luxury features including dual caesar stone bench tops, feature pendant lighting and 900mm gas cooker.
The master bedroom is spacious and is complete with an equally generous walk in robe. The ensuite boasts a luxury oversized shower and his 'n' her vanity.
The second living area continues the theme of 'light and bright' - a feature panelled glass window yet again frames a lovely outlook.
As impressive as this home is to the eye, it also delivers on efficiency with an impressive 5KW solar power system (20 panels).
I personally can't think of another property in today's market which offers such a genuine 'turn the key and start enjoying from day 1'. Simply too many additional features to list but here is just a few to wet your appetite; ducted heating and cooling, dual blinds, exposed aggregate concrete and quality finishes all round.
Central Walk has quickly established itself as Drysdale's exclusive estate. Beautiful wetlands, open tree lined streets and homes stamped with quality as far as the eye can see. This property looks a wonderful home for today and savvy investment for the future.
Insights: 41 Stonebridge Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

This 3 bedroom Boutique home in the popular "Drysdale Walk" estate is ready to move in. Separate formal lounge and large open plan living area. 3 Double bedrooms, built-in robes and full ensuite. Well appointed kitchen with 900mm gas cooker, single pantry and central island bench. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling. Outside is a covered alfresco area and simple rear yard. Description:
Immaculate Home in the Centre of Town
Located in one of Drysdale's most sought after locations, this immaculate home has it all. Comprising 3 bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom, 2 bathrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR), 2 spacious living areas, double lock up garage with rear garden access and side access for a boat or trailer. All wrapped up on a neat 447m2 parcel of land. This home has been built to suit the needs of a wide range of prospective purchasers. Proximity to everything that the Drysdale township has to offer. This immaculately presented home will impress.
Features low maintenance property for the retired purchaser or first home buyer working long hours, 2 RC air con, as new carpets, neutral decor, quiet neighbourhood close to parkland and walking distance to the Drysdale shopping hub.

Description:
Large on living
Centrally located modern family home offering multiple living zones, four bedrooms overlooking a linear reserve in a quiet cul-de-sac. Large tiled entry foyer opening out to the formal living & dining rooms.
Open plan kitchen, dining & casual lounge.
Kitchen with island bench, large gas hotplates & plenty of cupboard space.
Master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite.
Bedrooms two & three with built in robes.
Fourth bedroom / study.
Fantastic alfresco area for outdoor entertaining.
The Glen is in a central location with a good social community and backing onto the creek reserve.
Easy access to public & private schools, Drysdale Village shopping centre & public transport. A great location where kids feel safe to play on the street and ride or walk to school.

Description:
NOT FAR TO WALK TO DRYSDALE TOWNSHIP
From the moment you walk in the front door of this home you visually get the wow factor. The owner's creative layout has made the best use of the land. On two levels the top level includes Lounge, Bedroom 1, WIR, Ensuite, Laundry, Double Garage and Cloakroom. Down a few steps to the hub of the home which comprises open plan Family, Kitchen Meals, two Bedrooms with BIRs, Bathroom and an Indoor Outdoor Room. Full visibility of the tiered rear yard to keep an eye on the kids playing or simply enjoy the landscaped gardens including a fish pond. Solar hot water, centrally heated, open, light and airy. Double garage with remote. On a corner site with access to park your boat or caravan. Only the nature strip needs a mow because the lawn on the property is artificial.
The owners of this beautifully presented home have decided its time to move onto lifeâ??s next adventure. All they need now is for someone to buy their lovely home to make this happen. Only a short stroll to the Drysdale Township where you can find all the necessary amenities. The area has an array of restaurants, wineries, bike paths, sporting groups and just a short drive to Queenscliff for a ferry ride to Sorrento. Could that be on your to do list?
Donâ??t delay call today for an inspection you wonâ??t be disappointed.

Description:
ABSOLUTE HAVEN WITH VILLAGE POSITION ON APP. 1690 SQM.
A rare find, so peaceful here with bird life, private lush gardens, all just a short walk to Drysdale village. The verandah and native gardens frame the whole property creating a natural haven. Lounge room adjacent to well equipped kitchen, dining area with second living space, all generous proportions with northern orientation providing an abundance of natural light. Three bedrooms all with BIR'S as well as 2 with access to rear decking overlooking the gardens, 2 bathrooms and laundry. Features include alarm system, ducted gas heating, airing cabinet, reverse cycle air conditioner, ducted vac system, Corion kitchen benches, fans, built in storage units, watering systems, tanks, loads of storage, outside blinds and more to view. Driveway to extra-large double garage, with space for further parking and extra storage under home. So much on offer in the heart of Drysdale all amenities, schools, transport all within walking distance yet private and secluded.
